mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material (user_id, material_code, material_name, material_status, user_group, create_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{material_code}, #{material_name}, 0, #{user_group}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT material_code FROM material WHERE user_group = #{user_group} ORDER BY material_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT m.*, u.* FROM material m LEFT JOIN user u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.user_group = #{user_group} ORDER BY material_id DESC
